op.description: Name of the current network operator

ip.description: IP address of the device as IPv4, IPv6 or hostnames

cell_id.description: E-UTRAN cell ID of the currently connected LTE cell

ue_mode.description: UE mode of operation. 0 = packed switched mode 2 operation, 2 = combined circuit-switched and packet-switched mode 2 operation

lte_mode.description: 1 if LTE-M is used for the current LTE connection

nbiot_mode.description: 1 if NB-IoT is used for the current LTE connection

iccid.description: The SIM card's unique integrated circuit card identifier (ICCID)

interval.description: Requested interval from receiving message until server should respond to the client
